text: Five Finger Death Punch is an American heavy metal band from Los Angeles, California. Five Finger Death Punch has five members in the band; the current band members are Zoltan Bathory (originally from Hungary), Jason Hook, Chris Kael, Ivan Moody and Jeremy Spencer. == Band members == ;Current *Zoltan Bathory – guitars (since 2005) *Jason Hook – guitars, backing vocals (since 2009) *Chris Kael – bass, backing vocals (since 2011) *Ivan Moody – vocals (since 2006) *Jeremy Spencer – drums (since 2005) ;Former *Caleb Bingham – guitars (2006) *Darrell Roberts – guitars, backing vocals (2006–2009) *Matt Snell – bass, backing vocals (2006–2010) == Discography == So far as of 2011, Five Finger Death Punch has released 4 Studio albums: ===Albums=== *The Way of the Fist (2007) *War Is the Answer (2009) *American Capitalist (2011) *The Wrong Side Of Heaven And The Righteous Side Of Hell Vol. 1 (2013) *The Wrong Side Of Heaven And The Righteous Side Of Hell Vol. 2 (2013) *Got Your Six (2015) *And Justice for None (2018) *F8 (2020) *AfterLife (2022) ==References== == Other websites == *Official website Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Alternative metal bands Category:Groove metal bands Category:Hard rock bands Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles
title: Five Finger Death Punch
